Guidelines

Guideline 1.1 - Text Alternatives: Provide text alternatives for any non-text content so that it can be changed into other forms people need, such as large print, braille, speech, symbols or simpler language. Note: If non-text content is pure decoration, is used only for visual formatting, or is not presented to users, then it does not need text alternatives.
